Posts.Content: May 31, 2017 10:24PM - edited May 31, 2017 10:25PM by melissa233 yes it says 13.5 cm x 10 cm x up 2 cm, which is HUGE, it actually ulcerated on the skin. no node or vascular involved shockingly.

Posts.Title: was your stage of cancer noted on your pathology report? melissa233 chipilonadog

Posts.Content: melissa233 wrote: I have a very large tumor which made me stage 3 , it took up over 70% of my breast. BUT, all 12 nodes were free of cancer and no vasular invasion was seen. The Dr is pretty confident that the tumor was just in the breast and he said the only way for a tumor to travel and spread is through nodes or vascular, so my question is, if it was not in either of those, why do chemo? I was so nervous and forgot to ask, will on next apt. Dx 5/2/2016, IDC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/12 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/3/2016 Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Why chemo if no nodes or LV is present? melissa233 MinusTwo

Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2017 02:15PM melissa233 wrote: yes, i am really regretting my decision. it is to the point that i am getting alot of anxiety and depression. i literally think 24/7 about it, and think every little thing is the cancer back. it has ruined my life
Posts.Title: Why chemo if no nodes or LV is present? melissa233 MinusTwo

Posts.Content: melissa233 wrote: i was diagnosed stage 3 invasive ductal carcinoma with necrosis. Dr. said stage 3 is based on size only since i had 0/12 nodes involved. My tumor was 13.5 cm ulcerated. Is that strange for a tumor to be that big and no vascular or node involved? Not complaining just think some of the findings are odd. Also it is ER-, PgR- and KI67 of 95%. HER2 test is borderline. She also said she felt like it was more of a "surface tumor". What exactly does that mean? Not much was told to me so i am guessing i have a bad prognosis. Dx 5/2/2016, IDC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/12 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/3/2016 Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stage 3 breast cancer without lymph node involvement melissa233 Carolehebert

Posts.Content: melissa233 wrote: I was stage 3 at 35 yrs old. 0/12 nodes and no vascular invasion. only had mastectomy, refused chemo. regretting my decision 14 months later. Dx 5/2/2016, IDC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/12 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 5/3/2016 Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
